Definition: Acronym of the monetary fund used by the project linked to the identifying number of the project given by the monetary fund.
Format: Acronym of the monetary fund used by the project_Identifying number of the project given by the monetary fund

Definition: Acronym of the scientific project from which the data are drawn.
Full name of the scientific project from which the data are drawn.
Example: QUAlité des Milieux marins dans les zones POrtuaires en Méditerranée
Allowed values: 2 possible values: QUAlité des Milieux marins dans les zones POrtuaires en Méditerranée / QUAlité du milieu LItorral dans la mer des PERTUIS

Definition: Identifying number of the scientific project from which the data are drawn given by the monetary fund.
Origin of the monetary fund used by the project.
Example: Fonds Européen pour les Affaires Maritimes et la Pêche (FEAMP)
Allowed values: 2 possible values: Fonds Européen pour les Affaires Maritimes et la Pêche (FEAMP) / Convention Industrielle de Formation par la REcherche (CIFRE)

Definition: Name of the project coordinator.
Field of work of the project coordinator.
Example: Research, sustainable development, coast, global change, multidisciplinary
Allowed values: 2 possible values: Research, sustainable development, coast, global change, multidisciplinary / Coastline, Bio-monitoring, Biomarkers, Health status, Port area, Pertuis-Charentais

Definition: Start date of the project.
Date of the project completion.
Acurrate sampling location in a site.
Allowed values: 15 possible values: Calvi_port / Calvi_oil / Calvi_fairing / Ile_rousse_port / Ile_rousse_oil / Ile_rousse_fairing / St_florent_port / St_florent_oil  / St_florent_fairing / STARESO_port / Diana_mussel_farm / L'Houmeau_marsh_reference / Minimes_fairing / Minimes_rain_waters / Minimes_oil
Observations: The sampling could have take place near the petrol station (annotated "oil") or near the fairing area (annotated "fairing") of the port. When the sampling took place in the whole port, the sampling point is annotated "port".

Definition: Latitude of the sampling station.
Longitude of the sampling station.
Name of the location where the sampling took place given by the https://www.geonames.org/ website, if applicable.
Allowed values: 6 possible values: Calvi Port / Ile Rousse Port / Port Saint Florent / Les Minimes / L'Houmeau / NA
Observations: "NA" is used to signify an absence of information.

Definition: Name of the location of the sampling used by the researchers in their publications.
Allowed values: 9 possible values: Xavier Colonna Port / Ile Rousse Port / St-Florent Port / Station de Recherches Sous-marines et Océanographiques de Calvi / SARL Étang de Diana / Marsh / CAR / PLU / NFS

Definition: First name and surname of the location administrator.
Allowed values: 7 possible values: Philippe Gabrielli / Jean-Simon Savelli /  David Donnini / Pierre Lejeune / Bernard Pantalacci / Emmanuel Dubillot / Bertrand Moquay

Definition: If applicable, the name of the environmental label(s) obtained by the location.
Allowed values: 4 possible values: Pavillon bleu / Port propre and Pavillon bleu / NA / Not applicable
Observations: "NA" is used to signify an absence of information while "Not applicable" is used to express the non-applicability of the information for the station of interest.

Definition: Number of berths in the port in 2018 according to the port administrator.
Observations: "Not applicable" is used to express the non-applicability of the information for the station of interest.

Definition: Municipality in which the location where the sampling took place is located.
Allowed values: 5 possible values: Calvi / L'Île Rousse / Saint Florent / Aléria / La Rochelle

Definition: Unique identifier of the fieldwork carried out on a specific date and located at a specific station.
Allowed values: As many values as sampling conducted.

Definition: Acurrate sampling location in a port.
Allowed values: 15 possible values: Calvi_port / Calvi_oil / Calvi_fairing / Ile_rousse_port / Ile_rousse_oil / Ile_rousse_fairing / St_florent_port / St_florent_oil  / St_florent_fairing / STARESO_port / Diana_mussel_farm / L'Houmeau_marsh_reference / Minimes_fairing / Minimes_rain_waters / Minimes_oil
Observations: The sampling could have take place near the petrol station (annotated "oil") or near the fairing area (annotated "fairing") of the port. When the sampling took place in the whole port, the sampling point is annotated "port".

Definition: Date of the sampling.
Acronym of the monetary fund used by the project linked to the identifying number of the project given by the monetary fund.
Format: Acronym of the monetary fund used by the project_Identifying number of the project given by the monetary fund

Definition: Month of the year in which the sampling took place.
Allowed values: 9 possible values: January / February / April / May / August / September / October / November / December
Observations: The organisms sampling only took place during the months of january and september while the water sampling took place during the three months.

Definition: Year in which the sampling took place.
Unique identifier of a water sample.
Allowed values: As many values as water samples

Definition: Unique identifier of the fieldwork carried out on a specific date and located at a specific station.
Allowed values: As many values as sampling conducted.

Definition: Temperature of the subsurface water at the sampling station measured in celcius degrees by a multiparameter probe type YSI-Exo2 or a HANNA multi-parameter probe (HI9829).
Observations: "NA" used to signify an absence of information

Definition: Salinity of the subsurface water at the sampling station measured in practical salinity unit by a multiparameter probe type YSI-Exo2 or a HANNA multi-parameter probe (HI9829).
Observations: "NA" used to signify an absence of information

Definition: The concentration of oxygen in the subsurface water in mg per liter of water measured at the sampling station by a multiparameter probe type YSI-Exo2 or a HANNA multi-parameter probe (HI9829).
Observations: "NA" used to signify an absence of information

Definition: The chemical activity of the protons in the subsurface water at the sampling station measured by a multiparameter probe type YSI-Exo2 or a HANNA multi-parameter probe (HI9829).
Observations: "NA" used to signify an absence of information

Definition: Material content of the subsurface water at the sampling station measured in Formazin Nephelometric Unit (FNU) by a HANNA multi-parameter probe (HI9829).
Observations: "NA" used to signify an absence of information

Definition: Concentration of chlorophyll a measured in microgram per liter of subsurface water in a Niskin water sample taken at the sampling station and analysed by Turner fluorometry.
Observations: "NA" used to signify an absence of information and "NP" used to signify that the data is not public.

Definition: Concentration of nitrite measured in micromol per liter of subsurface water in a Niskin water sample taken at the sampling station and analysed by a SKALAR-type flow autoanalysis.
Observations: "LQn" used to define a data below the quantification limit, "LDn" used to define a data below the detection limit, "NA" used to signify an absence of information and "NP" used to signify that the data is not public.

Definition: Concentration in nanogram per liter of surface water of a group of chemical molecules with a common empirical formula, i.e. chrysene with the addition of two methyl (CH3) or one ethyl (C2H5), but with a different structural formula, as the methyls or the ethyl may be bonded to different atoms of the chrysene. The samples were analysed using a Gas chromatography mass spectrometry (GC-MS).
Observations: "LD" used to define a data below the detection limit, "NA" used to signify an absence of information and "NP" used to signify that the data is not public.

Definition: Concentration in nanogram per liter of surface water of a group of chemical molecules with a common empirical formula, i.e. chrysene plus three methyls (CH3), one ethyl (C2H5) and one methyl, or one propyl (C3H7), but with a different structural formula, as the methyls, the ethyl and the methyl, or the propyl may be bonded to different atoms of the chrysene. The samples were analysed using a Gas chromatography mass spectrometry (GC-MS).
Observations: "LD" used to define a data below the detection limit, "NA" used to signify an absence of information and "NP" used to signify that the data is not public.

Definition: Concentration of benzo[b+k]fluranthene in nanogram per liter of surface water analysed using a Gas chromatography mass spectrometry (GC-MS).
Observations: "LD" used to define a data below the detection limit, "NA" used to signify an absence of information and "NP" used to signify that the data is not public.

Observations: "LD" used to define a data below the detection limit, "NA" used to signify an absence of information and "NP" used to signify that the data is not public.

Observations: "LD" used to define a data below the detection limit, "NA" used to signify an absence of information and "NP" used to signify that the data is not public.

Definition: Concentration of indeno[1,2,3-cd]pyrene in nanogram per liter of surface water analysed using a Gas chromatography mass spectrometry (GC-MS).
Observations: "LQ" used to define a data below the quantification limit, "LD" used to define a data below the detection limit, "NA" used to signify an absence of information and "NP" used to signify that the data is not public.

Definition: Digital object identifier of the publication where the protocol followed for the water sampling may be found.
Unique identifier of the collected organism or pool of organisms.
Allowed values: As many values as organisms sampled

Definition: Unique identifier of the fieldwork carried out on a specific date and located at a specific station.
Allowed values: As many values as sampling conducted.

Definition: Species name of the sampled organism if known. If the species is not known, the genus name followed by "sp." is used.
Allowed values: 4 possible values: Patella sp. / Mytilus galloprovincialis / Holothuria sp. / Mimachlamys varia

Definition: Identifier of the sampled organism species if known according to the taxonomic repository TAXREF. If the species is not known, the genus given by the TAXREF is used, followed by "sp.".
Allowed values: 4 possible values: Patella sp. / Mytilus galloprovincialis / Holothuria sp. / Mimachlamys varia
References: MNHN & OFB [Ed]. 2003-2022. Inventaire national du patrimoine naturel (INPN), website : https://inpn.mnhn.fr 3 march 2022.

Definition: Unique identifier of the pool of organism(s).
Allowed values: As many values as pool sampled or created and analysed

Definition: Identifier of the sampled organism species if known according to the taxonomic repository TAXREF. If the species is not known, the genus given by the TAXREF is used, followed by "sp.".
Allowed values: 4 possible values: Patella sp. / Mytilus galloprovincialis / Holothuria sp. / Mimachlamys varia
References: MNHN & OFB [Ed]. 2003-2022. Inventaire national du patrimoine naturel (INPN), website : https://inpn.mnhn.fr 3 march 2022.
